mapper.select: SELECT b.num , b.userNum , u.name AS name , b.title , b.content , b.regdate , b.moddate , b.count , b.type FROM syh_board b JOIN syh_user u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE b.type = 2 ORDER BY b.num DESC;
SELECT b.num , b.userNum , u.name AS name , b.title , b.content , b.regdate , b.moddate , b.count , b.type FROM syh_board b JOIN syh_user u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE b.type = 1 ORDER BY b.num DESC;
SELECT b.num , b.userNum , u.name AS name , b.title , b.content , b.regdate , b.moddate , b.count FROM syh_board b JOIN syh_user u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE b.num = #{num};

SELECT b.num , b.userNum , u.name AS name , b.title , b.content , b.regdate , b.moddate , b.count , b.type FROM syh_board b JOIN syh_user u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE b.type = 2
AND b.title AND b.content AND u.name
LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY b.num DESC;

SELECT c.commentsNum , c.userNum , u.name AS name , c.boardNum , c.comments , c.regdate FROM syh_comments c JOIN syh_user u ON c.userNum = u.num JOIN syh_board b ON c.boardNum = b.num WHERE b.num = #{num};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM syh_comments c WHERE c.commentsNum = #{commentsNum}
